FEATURE_1_BODY: Update scores instantly as the match progresses, ensuring accurate and timely information for all users.
FEATURE_2_BODY: Track player performance, team records, and match analytics with our detailed statistical tools.
FEATURE_3_BODY: Score games across all cricket formats, from T20 to Test matches, with format-specific rules and calculations.

FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Everything you need to know about our cricket scoring app
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_1: How does the cricket scoring app work?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: Our app allows you to easily record and track cricket scores in real-time. Simply input the match details, player information, and update the score as the game progresses.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_2: Can I use the app for different formats of cricket?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: Yes, our app supports various cricket formats including Test matches, One Day Internationals (ODIs), Twenty20 (T20), and local league games.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: The app can be used offline for scoring, but an internet connection is required to sync data and access certain features like live sharing of scores.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_4: Can multiple users score a match simultaneously?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: Yes, our app supports collaborative scoring. Multiple users can contribute to scoring a single match, making it perfect for team use.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_5: How do I share match results?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: Once a match is completed, you can easily share results via email, text message, or social media platforms directly from the app.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_1: How do I start scoring a cricket match?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: To start scoring a cricket match, simply create a new game, enter the team names, and select the match format. Our intuitive interface will guide you through the rest of the process.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_2: Can I track individual player statistics?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: Yes, our app allows you to track detailed statistics for each player, including runs scored, balls faced, wickets taken, and economy rate. You can easily access this information during and after the match.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: Is it possible to share live scores with others?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: Absolutely! Our app provides a unique match link that you can share with friends, family, or team supporters. They can follow the live scores and statistics in real-time without needing to download the app.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_4: Can I use the app offline?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: Yes, our app works offline. You can score matches without an internet connection, and the data will automatically sync once you're back online. This ensures you can use the app in any cricket ground, regardless of connectivity.
